description:
Adette debuts as a commander of the Siberian Railway forces, and infiltrates the traveling city units in order to capture Princess Ana. Gain quickly thwarts her attempt, and with nowhere else to go, she begrudgingly starts a new life on the Exodus as a high school teacher for Gain and Sara`s class. She`s a tough and shrewd woman, but childlike in her temper and affection toward men.
Source: Wiki
name: Adette Kistler
